name: Vo-lifecycle-ui
body:
# Overview

![](https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/11465288?v=3&s=200)

vo-lifecycle-ui is an extension of [VO LifeCycle framework](http://vo-lifecycle.github.io/vo-lifecycle-core/) which can be used to provide a graphical representation of value object's lifecycles in a project.

# Installation with maven

## Maven repository

```xml
<repository>
    <id>vo-lifecycle-mvn-repo</id>
    <url>https://raw.github.com/vo-lifecycle/vo-lifecycle-ui/mvn-repo/</url>
    <snapshots>
        <enabled>true</enabled>
        <updatePolicy>always</updatePolicy>
    </snapshots>
</repository>
```

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>vo-lifecycle</groupId>
    <artifactId>vo-lifecycle-ui</artifactId>
    <version>${vo-lifecycle-ui.version}</version>
</dependency>
```

# Versions

Here's a list of available versions:

* 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT (In progress)
